name: libDrive
description: libDrive is a Google Drive media library manager and indexer, similar to Plex, that organizes Google Drive media to offer an intuitive and user-friendly experience.

LIBDRIVE_CLOUD.description: The ID of any empty Google Drive folder. This folder will be used to store the config and metadata generated by libDrive

LIBDRIVE_CONFIG.description: Create this through the config generator: https://config.libdrive.tk

LIBDRIVE_VERSION.description: The tag version or latest. Correct usage: 'v1.2.9' or 'latest'

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: Don't change this, leave the value as 1

BOT_TOKEN.description: The telegram bot token that you get from @BotFather.

LD_DOMAIN.description: Your Libdrive Domain without https:// or http://

ADMIN_IDS.description: The Telegram User ID of the Owner of the Bot. Get it by using /info in @MissRose_bot.

PIC.description: The Picture You want to appear when start command is used.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Name Of Heroku This App.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: The API Key of This Heroku Account.
